issue.title: Cannot launch on first install on Ubuntu 18.04

content.raw:
> [GUI] [Err] [Ogre2RenderEngine.cc:732]  Unable to create the rendering window

@{557058:1c682449-afd8-446f-8a50-370d34854634} For these specific errors, please see [this](https://ignitionrobotics.org/docs/blueprint/install#unable-to-create-the-rendering-window) troubleshooting guide and let us know if it helps.

> The README should be updated with this at least.

@{5dbae24e4ff1890d31037d0b} , the README already asks to install `libignition-gazebo2-dev`. Was that not enough for you? Note that from version 3, there won't be an `ignition-gazeboX` package.
content.html:
[GUI] [Err] [Ogre2RenderEngine.cc:732] Unable to create the rendering window

@Pierre Paques For these specific errors, please see this troubleshooting guide and let us know if it helps.

The README should be updated with this at least.

@Vincent sagri , the README already asks to install libignition-gazebo2-dev. Was that not enough for you? Note that from version 3, there won't be an ignition-gazeboX package.
